tasks.title: M1: Workflow spec + CLI (non-exec)
tasks.body:
Goal: define workflow file format + CLI surface without execution.

Deliverables:
- .forge/workflows location + naming conventions documented.
- Workflow schema doc (types, fields, stop conditions).
- CLI: workflow ls/show/validate (no run).

Acceptance:
- Can parse + validate example workflow file.
- Helpful errors on missing/invalid fields.
- CLI commands return non-zero on invalid files.

Tests:
- Unit tests for parser/validator.
- CLI tests for ls/show/validate.

tasks.title: M1.4: Workflow fixtures + validation tests
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Add fixture workflows (valid + invalid).
- Golden output for show/validate.
- Keep fixtures small and documented.

Acceptance:
- Tests cover common error cases.
- Fixtures used by CLI tests.

tasks.title: M1.1: Workflow schema doc + example
tasks.body:
Scope:
- New doc (docs/workflows.md) describing TOML fields.
- Example workflow file in .forge/workflows.
- Update quickstart or README with workflow mention.

Acceptance:
- Docs explain step types + stop conditions.
- Example validates with parser.

tasks.title: M1.3c: CLI workflow validate
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge workflow validate <name>.
- Exit non-zero on invalid.
- JSON output includes errors.

tasks.title: M1.3b: CLI workflow show
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge workflow show <name>.
- Render normalized workflow model.
- JSON output mode.

tasks.title: M1.3a: CLI workflow ls
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge workflow ls command.
- List names + file paths.
- JSON output mode.

tasks.title: M1.2c: Validation error reporting
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Error formatting with path + step id.
- Optional line/col when TOML parser provides.

Acceptance:
- CLI surfaces human-friendly errors.
- JSON output includes error code + location.

tasks.title: M1.2b: Workflow validator (schema + DAG)
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Validate required fields + types.
- Unique step ids, DAG integrity, cycles.

Acceptance:
- Invalid files return structured errors.
- Valid files return normalized model.

tasks.title: M1.2a: Workflow loader
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Load .forge/workflows/*.toml.
- Resolve workflow name + path.
- Return raw parsed model.

Acceptance:
- Loader returns TOML parse errors with file path.
- Supports listing workflows.

tasks.title: M5.3b: Webhook auth
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Bearer token verification for webhook requests.
- Config for shared secret.

Acceptance:
- Unauthorized requests rejected with 401.

tasks.title: M5.3c: Webhook job routing
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Map webhook endpoint to job name.
- Emit job run logs + status.

Acceptance:
- Webhook triggers job and returns run id.

tasks.title: M5.3a: Webhook server wiring
tasks.body:
Scope:
- HTTP server lifecycle.
- Route /hooks/<name> to job runner.

tasks.title: M3.4c: Fan-out status display
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Report per-step running/queued counts.
- Show in workflow logs/show.

tasks.title: M3.4a: Parallel scheduler core
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Scheduler to run ready steps concurrently.
- Respect dependencies + step limits.

Acceptance:
- Parallel steps run concurrently; failures stop dependents.

tasks.title: M3.1b: Stop tool runner
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Run tool/command for stop condition.
- Map exit status/output to true/false.

Acceptance:
- Tool failures are surfaced cleanly.

tasks.title: M3.1c: Loop stop integration
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Apply stop conditions in loop step executor.
- Stop on true condition + record reason.

Acceptance:
- Loop stops and marks step success when condition met.

tasks.title: M3.1a: Stop expr parser/eval
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Minimal expression language for stop conditions.
- Implement eval with workflow context.

Acceptance:
- Supports count(tasks.open) comparisons.

tasks.title: M2.3c: Workflow run persistence
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Persist workflow run metadata + step status.
- Allow resuming/log lookup by id.

Acceptance:
- Run id is stable and retrievable.

tasks.title: M2.4: Workflow ledger entries
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Extend ledger format for workflow runs.
- Include step summaries + durations.
- Keep loop ledger unchanged for now.

Acceptance:
- Workflow run writes ledger entry per step.
- Ledger links to run id.

Tests:
- Unit test for ledger writer.

tasks.title: M2.3b: CLI workflow logs
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge workflow logs <run-id>.
- Show per-step logs.

Acceptance:
- Logs are readable and ordered.

tasks.title: M2.2c: Loop step executor
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Execute loop step by reusing loop runner.
- Track loop iteration count + stop status.

Acceptance:
- Loop step runs until stop condition or max iterations.

tasks.title: M2.3a: CLI workflow run
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge workflow run <name>.
- Return run id + status.

Acceptance:
- Runs a simple sequential workflow.

tasks.title: M2.2b: Bash step executor
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Execute bash step in repo workdir.
- Capture stdout/stderr + exit code.

Acceptance:
- Bash step logs are stored and viewable.

tasks.title: M2.2a: Agent step executor
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Execute agent step using existing harness runner.
- Capture stdout/stderr + exit status.

Acceptance:
- Agent step produces step output + logs.

tasks.title: M2.1: Workflow engine (sequential DAG)
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Build workflow execution engine with topo sort.
- Track step state (pending/running/success/failed).
- Persist run metadata (id, timestamps, errors).

Acceptance:
- Deterministic step order for simple DAG.
- Failure stops downstream steps.

Tests:
- Unit tests for topo ordering + failure propagation.

tasks.title: M5: Jobs + triggers (cron/webhook)
tasks.body:
Goal: job layer that starts workflows via triggers.

Scope:
- Job definitions + persistence.
- Trigger types: cron + webhook.
- Job run history + logs.

Acceptance:
- Can register job and trigger it by cron or webhook.
- Job run emits logs and status.
- CLI to list/show/rerun jobs.

Tests:
- Unit tests for trigger parsing.
- Integration test: cron trigger fires a workflow.

tasks.title: M3: Stop conditions, inputs/outputs, hooks, fan-out
tasks.body:
Goal: add richer workflow semantics without triggers or mesh.

Scope:
- Stop conditions (expr/tool/loop count).
- Step inputs/outputs binding.
- Pre/post hooks on steps + workflow.
- Fan-out with fixed concurrency limit.

Acceptance:
- Stop conditions can end loops deterministically.
- Outputs flow into downstream step inputs.
- Hooks run and are logged.
- Fan-out executes in parallel with bounded concurrency.

Tests:
- Unit tests for stop evaluation + IO binding.
- Integration test for fan-out execution order.

tasks.title: M2: Workflow runner (sequential, minimal steps)
tasks.body:
Goal: execute workflows sequentially with minimal step types.

Scope:
- Step types: agent, bash, loop.
- Sequential DAG execution (topo order), no fan-out.
- Basic run log + step status persisted.

Acceptance:
- forge workflow run executes a simple workflow end-to-end.
- Step failures stop workflow with clear error.
- Logs show per-step start/stop + duration.

Tests:
- Unit tests for DAG order.
- Integration test: run sample workflow with bash steps.

tasks.title: M6: Nodes + mesh routing
tasks.body:
Goal: multi-node orchestration with master routing.

Scope:
- forged daemon: register node + accept commands.
- Mesh registry + master selection.
- Remote execution of workflow/loop commands.

Acceptance:
- Can register a node and run workflow remotely.
- Master failover documented (even if manual).
- Security: bearer token enforced for remote calls.

Tests:
- Integration test with local loopback daemon.
- Unit tests for routing decisions.

tasks.title: M4: Human-in-loop steps + approvals
tasks.body:
Goal: allow workflows to block on human approval.

Scope:
- Step type: human (prompt + timeout).
- Approval storage + CLI to approve/deny.
- Workflow status shows blocked + reason.

Acceptance:
- Workflow pauses at human step and resumes on approval.
- Timeout handling documented and tested.
- CLI surface for approvals documented.

Tests:
- Integration test with manual approval flow.
- Unit tests for approval state transitions.

tasks.title: M3.4b: Concurrency config
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Config for max parallel steps (global + per workflow).
- Surface in docs and CLI show.

tasks.title: M6.3: Remote routing for workflow/loop
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Route commands to master -> node.
- Error handling when node offline.

Acceptance:
- forge node exec runs on remote.
- forge workflow run --node works.

Tests:
- Integration test with local + simulated node.

tasks.title: M6.2: Mesh registry + master selection
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Mesh config storage.
- Promote/demote master (manual).

Acceptance:
- Mesh status shows active master.

Tests:
- Unit tests for registry + selection.

tasks.title: M6.1: forged node daemon + registration
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forged API for exec + status.
- Node registration + auth token.

Acceptance:
- Local forged accepts a loop/workflow command.

Tests:
- Integration test for daemon API.

tasks.title: M5.4: CLI job/trigger commands
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge job ls/show/run/logs/cancel.
- forge trigger add/ls/rm.

Acceptance:
- CLI commands work end-to-end.

Tests:
- CLI tests for job + trigger flows.

tasks.title: M5.2: Trigger scheduler (cron)
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Cron parser + scheduler loop.
- Trigger storage + next fire time.

Acceptance:
- Cron triggers start jobs.
- Misconfigured cron rejected.

Tests:
- Unit tests for cron parsing.

tasks.title: M5.1: Job model + persistence
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Define job config format.
- Persist job runs (status, inputs, outputs).

Acceptance:
- Jobs can be created + listed.
- Run history stored and retrievable.

Tests:
- Unit tests for job store.

tasks.title: M4.3: Blocked status in workflow show
tasks.body:
Scope:
- show command displays blocked steps + reason.
- Include timeout info.

Acceptance:
- Operators can see where to approve.

Tests:
- CLI test for blocked output.

tasks.title: M4.2: CLI approvals
tasks.body:
Scope:
- forge workflow approve/deny <run> <step>.
- List blocked steps for a run.

Acceptance:
- Approve resumes workflow.
- Deny stops workflow with reason.

Tests:
- Integration test for approve path.

tasks.title: M4.1: Human step model + persistence
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Add human step type fields (prompt, timeout).
- Persist approval state + timestamps.
- Default timeout behavior documented.

Acceptance:
- Workflow pauses at human step.
- State survives process restart.

Tests:
- Unit tests for human step state transitions.

tasks.title: M3.3: Step/workflow hooks
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Pre/post hooks on workflow + step.
- Hook types: bash initially.
- Hook failures configurable (fail|warn).

Acceptance:
- Hooks run in order and log output.
- Fail mode stops workflow.

Tests:
- Integration test with pre/post hooks.

tasks.title: M3.2: Inputs/outputs binding
tasks.body:
Scope:
- Define input/output mapping in workflow structs.
- Resolve outputs into downstream inputs.
- Support simple templating (e.g., {{steps.id.output}}).

Acceptance:
- Downstream step receives upstream outputs.
- Missing output yields clear error.

Tests:
- Unit tests for binding + error cases.
